slides.title: Welcome to Conservation
slides.content:
# Introduction to Conservation

Welcome to **Conservation** - protecting biodiversity!

## What You Will Learn:
- **Biodiversity** - Why it matters
- **Threats** - What endangers species
- **Strategies** - Protection methods
- **Success Stories** - Conservation wins

> **Fun Fact:** We're losing species 1000x faster than natural rates!

slides.title: Biodiversity
slides.content:
# Biodiversity

## Levels:
- Genetic diversity
- Species diversity
- Ecosystem diversity

## Importance:
- Ecosystem services
- Food security
- Medicine sources
- Climate regulation
- Aesthetic value

## Hotspots:
- High species richness
- High threat level
- Examples: Amazon, Madagascar, Coral Triangle

## Numbers:
- ~8.7 million species estimated
- ~2 million described
- Many still undiscovered

slides.title: Threats
slides.content:
# Threats to Biodiversity

## HIPPO:

| Threat | Description |
|--------|------------|
| Habitat loss | Deforestation, development |
| Invasive species | Non-native competitors |
| Pollution | Contamination |
| Population growth | Resource demand |
| Overexploitation | Hunting, fishing |

## Additional:
- Climate change
- Disease

## Endangered Species:
- IUCN Red List
- Categories: Vulnerable -> Endangered -> Critically Endangered -> Extinct

slides.title: Conservation Strategies
slides.content:
# Conservation Strategies

## Protected Areas:
- National parks
- Wildlife reserves
- Marine protected areas
- World Heritage Sites

## Species-Based:
- Captive breeding
- Reintroduction
- Ex-situ conservation (zoos)
- Genetic banking

## Ecosystem-Based:
- Habitat restoration
- Wildlife corridors
- Sustainable management

## Community:
- Involvement of local people
- Ecotourism
- Sustainable livelihoods

slides.title: Summary
slides.content:
# Conservation Summary

## Biodiversity:
- Genetic, species, ecosystem
- Essential for human welfare

## Main Threats:
- Habitat loss (biggest)
- HIPPO framework

## Strategies:
| Approach | Example |
|----------|--------|
| Protected areas | National parks |
| Species-based | Captive breeding |
| Ecosystem-based | Restoration |
| Community | Ecotourism |
